definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drink (NH id.; As. šatû, Eth. sataya: OAram. [[שתה]], Aram. [[שְׁתָא]], [[אִשְׁתִּי]], [4t0], 0e4tiy; Sab. [[שתי]] DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 403 Hom:Chr 124);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of man: drink, water, wine, etc., Ex 34:28 (JE), cf. Ex 15:24 (J), 1Sa 30:12, Am 2:8, Am 4:8, Am 5:11, Is 5:22, Is 62:8, Is 62:9, Pr 31:4, Ju Jdg 13:4, Jdg 13:7, Jdg 13:14 + oft. (2 t. JE; 6 t. D); by measure (short allowance) Ez Eze 4:11, Eze 4:16; milk † Ez Eze 25:4, cf. Ct So 5:1; blood 1Ch 11:19 (fig. of water gained by hazard); fig. [[חֲמָתָם שׁׂתָה רוּחִי]] Job 6:4 whose venom [of arrows of ´[[י]]:] my spirit drinks up; acc. + [[מִן]] of source † Ex 7:18 (J), v:Ex 7:21 (E), Ex 15:23 (J), Pr 5:15 (fig.); acc. (of wine, water, etc.) om. Ge 24:14, Ge 24:14, Ge 27:25, Ge 43:34 (all J) + 11 t. J, Ex 7:24, Ex 17:6 (E), Nu 20:5, (JE), v:Nu 20:11, Nu 33:14 (P), Ju Jdg 15:19 + oft.; acc. [[שׁין]] † 2Ki 18:27 = Is 36:12; [[מַמְתַקִּים]] Ne 8:10; abs. Ec 2:24 +; + [[מִן]] of source 1Ki 17:4, 1Ki 17:6, Ps 110:7, [[מִכּׂסוֹ]] 2Sa 12:3; [[בְּמִזְרְקֵי יַיִן]] ´[[שׁ]]: † Am 6:6, cf. Ge 44:5; [[בְּיַיִן]] ´[[שׁ]]: † Pr 9:5;

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מִן]] partit. Ge 9:21, Ex 7:24, Ru 2:9, also (fig.) Je 51:7 (and Job 21:20 infra). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: pt. as subst. [[שׁׂתֵי מַיִם]] Ez Eze 31:14, Eze 31:16, [[שׁׂתֵי יַיִן]] Joe 1:5; [[שׁוֹתֵי שֵׁכָר]] Ps 69:13.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: drink wine in sacrificial feast De 32:38 (poem); blood of sacrificial victim Ps 50:13 (fig. of ´[[י]]:).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: subj. animals Nu 20:19, Jon 3:7 (both + men), also (fig.) Ez Eze 34:18, Eze 34:19; acc. (water) om. Ge 24:19, Ge 24:22, Ge 30:38, Ge 30:38.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: drink blood, fig. of slaughter, Nu 23:24 (JE; of lion, metaph. of Isr.), Zec 9:15 (read [[דָּמָם]] for [[הָמוּ]] LXX:Codd. Sta Now Marti); so (blood of ´[[י]]:’s sacrifice) Ez Eze 39:17, Eze 39:18, Eze 39:19.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: fig. of wicked deeds: [[יֵין חֲמָסִים יִשְׁתּוּ]] Pr 4:17 (‖[[לָֽחֲמוּ לֶחֶם רֶשַׁע ]]; these are their food and drink), cf. Job 15:16, Job 34:7, but Pr 26:6 appar. = suffers violence (cf. De Toy). †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׁתֶה]] Le 11:34 (P) all which is (may be) drunk, c. [[ב]] of vessel.—[[נִשְׁתָָּוׇה]] Pr 27:15 v. I. [[שׁוה]] ad fin. For cause, give, to drink v. [[שׁקה]].
